author: akerh001
title: a great FREE set
review:
i brought the daily mirror today as i have done every day for this great leo promotion this set only cost me 45p and i was extremely happy to get this one today

pros
cheap
cool parts 
droid
blue slope
cheap

cons

author: thewish
title: STAP
review:
Got this with the Daily Mirror promotion. If you can't get this, the EXACT SAME THING comes with the AT-TE (Clone Wars) Walker, so it's not a giant disaster if you missed the promotion.

PROS-
Battle Droid
Great Playability
Good for customising
Stays together well

CONS-
No weapon for droid

You won't regret buying this. Great set for (almost) free.

author: Carl
title: I really don't like those blue STAPs
review: I've never liked blue. and when they put blue on a STAP, I just went yuck! OK, maybe not so bad, but I still dont think it suits it. As for the actual playability and other stuff Lego jargan, its not a bad set. If you got tons of these then I would strangle you with a bunch a sheeps intestines because I just couldnt get over the huge amount of blue. But the droid is cool and the build of the STAP itself isnt to disimalar to that of the old one, which I really liked (it was also because it was brown). Brown suits suits STAPs more George Lucas, so chuck out blue while you can.

author: Firox_5000
title: battle droid oncoming
review:
This set is a very good set to accompany the clone walker mini. The set includes a battle droid and speeder which goes well with all clone wars sets e.g clone turbo tank.

 

I thorughly recomend you try and buy this.

author: AdeelZubair
title: Good blue and dark grey elements!
review:
This set contains a normal battle droid and the main draw the STAP.

Good points
-If you collect unique LEGO elements this set is for you it has: 2x megaphones, 2x lightsaber hilts, 2x 1x1 4 knobs and blue elements.

Bad points
-None 

Overall this set is a very good way to build a droid army and collect STAPs Must have for any  Star Wars fans.
